miniProjects.title: Task Manager
miniProjects.bodyText:
- A task management application built with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and MySQL.
- Create, edit, and delete tasks with rich text descriptions.
- Advanced filtering by completion status, creation date, and smart search functionality across all task fields.
- Clean, responsive design optimized for all devices with a simple user interface.
- Backend API built with Node.js and Express for comprehensive task CRUD operations.
- Persistent data storage with MySQL database for reliable task management.

miniProjects.title: Sample Flutter App
miniProjects.bodyText:
- A mobile application built using Flutter with user authentication via API integration.
- Features secure login functionality with persistent sessions using SQLite and SharedPreferences.
- Stores user details locally for offline access with SQLite database integration.
- Implements a responsive design with a light blue theme and modern UI/UX elements.
- Includes comprehensive error handling with user-friendly messages for better user experience.
- Follows a structured navigation flow between login, home, and database screens.
